content: Hi all. I raised https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/86374 a few weeks ago which (optimistically) enables -static-pie support for the x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu target (similar to the -musl target). This MR has languished a bit, in part because the change fails CI, but (as I commented in the MR discussion) it's possible that the better fix to the failing CI job is to upgrade the CI environment. What can/should I do to help unblock this MR?
